60 cm us7 - 24 and 3 5 mm - 20 cm us4 - 10 4 = 18sts in the round using 4 5mm us7 needles 8 the needle size is only a guide change the size if needed removable sdtch markers sdtch holder or waste yarn to reach the correct gauge abbreviations pattern st s sdtch es this sweater is worked boaom up in the round to the k knit sdtch p purl sdtch underarm the sleeves are worked separately and then bor -
